summary: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.
cast: John Travolta|Andie MacDowell|William Hurt|Bob Hoskins|Robert Pastorelli|Jean Stapleton|Teri Garr|Wallace Langham|Joey Lauren Adams|Carla Gugino|Tom Hodges|Catherine Lloyd Burns|Richard Schiff|Calvin Trillin|Donald J. title: Michael
